pdf.body:
${record.subsidiary}
Invoice Date: ${record.trandate?string("MMM-dd-yyyy")}
Due Date: ${record.duedate?string("MMM-dd-yyyy")}
Currency: ${record.currency}
PO #: ${record.otherrefnum}
${record.memo}
<#if record.subsidiary == 'Mobius Solutions LTD'>
VAT #: 515245173
Ben Avigdor 18
P.O Box 57048
Tel Aviv 6157001
ISRAEL
Email: billing@optimove.com
</#if> <#if record.subsidiary == 'Optimove UK Limited'>
VAT #: 258697344
14 Gray’s Inn Road
Unit 2040
London WC1X 8HN
United Kingdom
Email: billing@optimove.com
</#if>
<#assign primarycur_exchange = record.exchangerate> <#assign secondary_exchange = 1> <#assign total_exchange = 1> <#assign currency_text = record.currency> <#assign currency_symbol = record.currencysymbol> <#if record.accountingbookdetail?has_content> <#list record.accountingbookdetail as abd> <#assign secondary_exchange = abd.exchangerate> </#list> </#if> <#if record.subsidiary == 'Mobius Solutions LTD'> <#if record.taxtotal != 0> <#assign currency_text = 'ILS'> <#assign total_exchange = secondary_exchange > <#assign primarycur_exchange = record.exchangerate> </#if> </#if> <#if currency_text == 'ILS'> <#assign currency_symbol = "ILS"> </#if>
Bill To:
${record.billaddress}
VAT #: ${record.vatregnum}
<#assign print_type = ' Original'> <#if record.custbody_ilo_org_printed> <#assign print_type = ' Copy'> </#if> <#if record.custbodycustbody_ilo_print_draft> <#assign print_type = ' Draft'> </#if>
<#if record.subsidiary == 'Optimove UK Limited'> <#assign print_type = ''> </#if>
Tax Invoice #${record.tranid}
${print_type}
<#if record.item?has_content>
<#list record.item as item><#if item_index==0>
Item Quantity Unit Price Total Item
</#if>
${item.item}
<#if item.custcol_oprate?has_content> Unit Rate: ${item.custcol_oprate} </#if> <#if item.custcol_opexrate?has_content> Ex. Rate: ${item.custcol_opexrate} </#if> <#if item.custcol_fromdate?has_content && item.custcol_todate?has_content> From: ${item.custcol_fromdate?string("MMM-dd-yyyy")} To: ${item.custcol_todate?string("MMM-dd-yyyy")}
</#if> ${item.description}
<#assign currency_sym = ''> <#if record.currency == 'ILS'> <#assign currency_sym = '₪'> </#if>
${item.quantity} ${(item.rate * total_exchange)?string[",##0.00"]} ${currency_symbol} ${(item.amount * total_exchange)?string[",##0.00"]} ${currency_symbol}
</#list>
</#if>
Sub Total ${(record.subtotal * total_exchange)?string[",##0.00"]} ${currency_symbol}
<#if record.taxtotal != 0>
Vat ${record.taxtotal / record.subtotal * 100}% ${(record.taxtotal * total_exchange)?string[",##0.00"]} ${currency_symbol}
</#if> <#if record.taxtotal == 0>
Total Vat 0
</#if>
Total Invoice ${(record.total * total_exchange)?string[",##0.00"]} ${currency_symbol}
<#if record.subsidiary =='Optimove UK Limited' && currency_symbol != 'GBP' && record.taxtotal != 0 >
Total Vat ${(record.taxtotal * (secondary_exchange))?string[",##0.00"]} (GBP)
</#if>
<#if record.subsidiary == 'Mobius Solutions LTD'>
Wire Instructions:
Account Name: Mobius Solutions Ltd
Bank Name: Mizrahi Tefahot
Branch: 494
Account Number: 196230
Swift code: MIZBILIT
IBAN: IL23-0204-9400-0000-0196-230
</#if> <#if record.subsidiary == 'Optimove UK Limited'>
Bank details
GBP Wire Details:
Name and Address: Bank Leumi (UK) plc, 20 Stratford Place, London W1C 1BG
SWIFT Code: LUMIGB22WES
Sorting Code (Sterling CHAPS & BACS): 30-14-95
IBAN: GB49LUMI30149571774001
USD Wire Details:
Correspondent Bank: JP MORGAN CHASE BANK, NEW YORK
Correspondent Bank SWIFT Code: CHASUS33XXX
Account with institution: LUMIGB22WES
For further credit to: OPTIMOVE UK LTD, IBAN: GB22LUMI30149571774002
EUR Wire Details:
Correspondent Bank: DEUTSCHE BANK, FRANKFURT
Correspondent Bank SWIFT Code: DEUTDEFFXXX
Account with institution: LUMIGB22WES
For further credit to: OPTIMOVE UK LTD, IBAN GB15LUMI40525971774003
</#if>
